answers.answer: Hello.Diabetic Neuropathy can have muscle cramps as one of the symptoms. Getting your blood sugars under control will help.You should also monitor your blood levels of electrolytes. ( sodium and potassium).Regards

question: I'm a 77 year old male,Diabetic with some neuropathy in my feet and ankles. I wake up at night with leh cramps. My GP had prescribed Quinine and it worked with out fail. Now the FDA has withdrawn it for leg cramps and replaced it with a very expensive substitute.Question: Is this caused by the diabetes? Do you have any suggestions?
title: Joehed
